title: >>> ARMAGEDDON?
body_text:
Megill vs. Edwards
,
Avakian vs. Londono
,
Basista vs. Marzarella
, or even
Adams vs. Fitzpatrick
perhaps do not equal the intense, emotional roller coaster ride
WALL vs. ALL
has proven to be.
In late-June 2007, the world bared witness to the first of these horrific battles as warriors from all parts of the state waged war like never before. Team ALL, comprised of a massive seventeen strong, failed to conquer the mighty ten person counter-attack Team WALL had formulated.
Just three short weeks later, the "knight-mare" indeed prolonged for the unwelcomed visitors who were harshly obliterated in five straight.
One has to wonder when the sadistic massacres and unrelenting punishments will cease.
Will
Team WALL
close the casket once and for all?
Is this the end of
Team ALL
?
Probable Participants
[as of early Friday, October 12]
Team WALL
: Kevin Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, Chris Adams, Justin Pierce, Alison Bertsch, Kevin Adams, Justin Wolf, Travis Mills, Tom Adams. Other allies may include Sascha Basista, Michelle Mullins, Dan Karen, and Lenny Herrera.
Team ALL
: Mike Butler, Grant Cornero, Rob Avakian, John Tronolone, Juan Londono, Diana DiBuccio, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Dan Turner, Jim Butler, Pam D'Luhy, Kevin Megill. Other allies may include Lauren Stopa, Joey Smalls, Valerie Winston, Ray Marzarella, and Lauren Winston.
History Section
WALL vs. ALL 1:
DODGEBALL 93
WALL vs. ALL 2:
DODGEBALL 97
body_html:
Megill vs. Edwards, Avakian vs. Londono, Basista vs. Marzarella, or even Adams vs. Fitzpatrick perhaps do not equal the intense, emotional roller coaster ride WALL vs. ALL has proven to be.

In late-June 2007, the world bared witness to the first of these horrific battles as warriors from all parts of the state waged war like never before. Team ALL, comprised of a massive seventeen strong, failed to conquer the mighty ten person counter-attack Team WALL had formulated.

Just three short weeks later, the "knight-mare" indeed prolonged for the unwelcomed visitors who were harshly obliterated in five straight.

One has to wonder when the sadistic massacres and unrelenting punishments will cease.

Will Team WALL close the casket once and for all?
Is this the end of Team ALL?




Probable Participants [as of early Friday, October 12]
Team WALL: Kevin Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, Chris Adams, Justin Pierce, Alison Bertsch, Kevin Adams, Justin Wolf, Travis Mills, Tom Adams. Other allies may include Sascha Basista, Michelle Mullins, Dan Karen, and Lenny Herrera.

Team ALL: Mike Butler, Grant Cornero, Rob Avakian, John Tronolone, Juan Londono, Diana DiBuccio, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Dan Turner, Jim Butler, Pam D'Luhy, Kevin Megill. Other allies may include Lauren Stopa, Joey Smalls, Valerie Winston, Ray Marzarella, and Lauren Winston.

History Section
WALL vs. ALL 1: DODGEBALL 93
WALL vs. ALL 2: DODGEBALL 97
